SELECT plcyNo, plcyNm, plcyExplnCn, lclsfNm, bizPrdBgngYmd, bizPrdEndYmd FROM policy
AND (plcyNm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR plcyExplnCn LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
AND (sprtTrgtMinAge IS NULL OR sprtTrgtMinAge <= #{age}) AND (sprtTrgtMaxAge IS NULL OR sprtTrgtMaxAge >= #{age})
AND (earnMaxAmt IS NULL OR earnMaxAmt >= #{income})
AND ( JSON_SEARCH(zipCd, 'one', CONCAT('%', #{regionSi}, '%')) IS NOT NULL OR JSON_SEARCH(zipCd, 'one', '전국') IS NOT NULL )
AND (schoolCd IS NULL OR JSON_SEARCH(schoolCd, 'one', #{educationLevel}) IS NOT NULL)
AND (jobCd IS NULL OR JSON_SEARCH(jobCd, 'one', #{employmentStatus}) IS NOT NULL)
AND (bizPrdEndYmd IS NULL OR bizPrdEndYmd >= CURDATE())
ORDER BY CASE WHEN bizPrdEndYmd IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, bizPrdEndYmd ASC
SELECT plcyNo, plcyNm, plcyExplnCn, lclsfNm, bizPrdBgngYmd, bizPrdEndYmd FROM policy WHERE plcyNo = #{id}
